name: Goose Hunt
description:
A Titled Goose Game about defeating an evil goose. You will probably want a mouse for this.

---

MOVE : WASD / Arrow Keys 

JUMP : Space

AIM + SHOOT : Mouse

---

Submission to Pirate Jam Pre-Jam Skirmish 2020!

Created by Jon Topielski / pyrecraftgames(at)gmail.com

Work is 100% original. Eligible for grand prize in jam.
